mapper.update: update order_ set order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_start_rtime = #{orderStartRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_end_time = #{orderEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_pay_status = #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, employer_id = #{employerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hire_id = #{hireId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_status, order_price, order_start_rtime, order_end_time, order_type, order_pay_status, employer_id, hire_id from order_ where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
